law.catch_line: Law governing perfection and priority of agricultural liens.
law.text: While farm products are located in a jurisdiction, the local law of that jurisdiction governs perfection, the effect of perfection or nonperfection, and the priority of an agricultural lien on the farm products.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 42, effective July 1, 2001. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 172, effective January 1, 1997. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 64, effective July 1, 1987. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 1. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 1. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 1. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 9-302, effective July 1, 1960.
